name: Norma(lies)
tagline: The media has a short memory. Don't let them "norma-lies" Donald Trump and his administration.
body:
### We wish this site didn't have to exist.

Sadly, it does. The thing about bigotry is that it quickly pervades any environment that doesn't immediately reject it.

Journalists are particularly susceptible to letting indiscretions slide when they are perceived as minor. Gaining and maintaining access to those in power is a key part of reporters' jobs; hence the term 'source greasing' (more on that [here](http://www.cjr.org/politics/profiles_in_source_greasing.php) and [here](http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2009/07/02/AR2009070202686.html)).
